bread.name: Original
bread.description: Come try our delicious original bread, made with the highest quality ingredients and baked to perfection by our skilled pastry chefs.

bread.name: Baguette
bread.description: A baguette is a long, thin loaf of French bread that is traditionally made from wheat flour, water, yeast, and salt.

bread.name: Extra Coffe
bread.description: Our bread coffee is a unique and delicious blend of freshly baked bread and premium coffee beans, creating a one-of-a-kind flavor experience.

dessert.name: Strawberry Cream
dessert.description: Strawberry cream is a dessert that typically consists of fresh strawberries and whipped cream.

dessert.name: Sweet Waffle
dessert.description: Sweet waffle is a dessert that is made by cooking a batter made of flour, sugar, eggs, milk, and butter in a waffle iron, which creates a crispy, sweet, and fluffy texture.

dessert.name: Choco Pancake
dessert.description: Choco Pancake is a dessert that is made by adding chocolate chips or cocoa powder to the pancake batter before cooking to give a chocolate flavor and chocolate chunks in the pancakes.

icecream.name: Chocolate
icecream.description: Chocolate ice cream is a frozen dessert made from cream, milk, sugar, and cocoa powder, which gives it a rich, creamy chocolate flavor.

icecream.name: Strawberry
icecream.description: Strawberry ice cream is a frozen dessert made from cream, milk, sugar, and fresh or frozen strawberries, which gives it a sweet, fruity, and refreshing flavor.

icecream.name: Vanilla
icecream.description: Vanilla ice cream is a classic frozen dessert made from cream, milk, sugar, and vanilla extract, which gives it a sweet and creamy, versatile flavor that can be paired with various toppings and desserts.

coffe.name: Latte
coffe.description: A latte is a coffee drink made by combining steamed milk and espresso, often topped with a thin layer of foam, which results in a creamy, smooth and balanced flavor.

coffe.name: Arabica
coffe.description: Arabica coffee is a type of coffee that is known for its sweeter and more delicate flavor, with lower acidity and higher aroma, it is considered as one of the finest and most sought-after coffee beans in the world.
